sentences.en: " Rely upon the patriotic Jury, dear citizeness. I answer for my fellow - Jurymen. "
sentences.cn: “ 相信爱国的陪审团吧, 亲爱的女公民, 我可以为我陪审团的伙计们打包票. ”

sentences.en: a patriotic man who served his country well
A tablet commemorates his patriotic activities.
sentences.cn: 碑文铭记他的爱国行动.

sentences.en: Everyone said that he had behaved splendidly and praised his patriotic action.
sentences.cn: 人人都称赞他的崇高行为和颂扬他的爱国行动.

sentences.en: Here's refund of $ 62 million -- my gift to you as a patriotic American.
sentences.cn: 退还你们六千二百万美元的工资,这是我--作为一个爱国的美国人 -- 送给你们的礼物.

sentences.en: His speech was full of patriotic sentiments.
sentences.cn: 他的演说充满了爱国之情.

sentences.en: How beautifully gold brooches glitter on the bosoms of our patriotic women!
sentences.cn: 金光闪闪的别针佩在我国爱国妇女的胸前,多美呀!

sentences.en: I shall evermore cherish the memory of the patriotic poet.
sentences.cn: 我将永远怀念这位爱国诗人.

sentences.en: Patriotic soldiers appealed for the prevention of a civil war.
sentences.cn: 爱国的士兵呼吁防止发生内战.

sentences.en: The old man is a patriotic overseas Chinese.
sentences.cn: 这位老人是一位爱国华侨.

sentences.en: The Patriotic Front has been a political irrelevance.
sentences.cn: 爱国者战线在政治上一直无足轻重。

sentences.en: The politician played on the patriotic sentiments of the people from ulterior motives.
sentences.cn: 那个政客别有用心地利用人们的情绪.

sentences.en: The volunteers were fortified by their patriotic belief.
sentences.cn: 爱国信念更加坚定了志愿者们的信心。

sentences.en: We will consolidate and develop the broadest possible patriotic united front.
sentences.cn: 巩固和发展最广泛的爱国统一战线.

words.tran_cn: 爱国主义；爱国心，爱国精神

trans.tran_cn: 爱国的，有爱国心的，爱国主义的
trans.tran_en: having or expressing a great love of your country
